issue: Startを押してもリアルタイム翻訳が始まらない

D1.note: /token, /translate, /summarize, /audio_m4a are NOT using authFetch. This is likely the issue.

D2.note: Rewrites OK. /token and /translate return 405 from Cloud Run (not HTML)

D3.note: No fatal errors in logs. GET 405s are normal. No POST requests logged = frontend blocked?

D4.note: No env vars set! OPENAI_API_KEY missing. User needs to run gcloud run services update command.

D5.note: Added status display, detailed error messages with status codes, console.error logging

D7.note: Synced static to public, deployed 7 files to Firebase Hosting

D8.note: Root cause: fetch() without auth. Fixed: all endpoints use authFetch(). Next: set OPENAI_API_KEY if not done

D9.note: Firestore API enabled, DB exists, SA has roles/datastore.user

D10.note: Fixed logger extra=json.dumps() bug - 18 occurrences fixed in app.py

D11.note: Cloud Run redeployed - revision realtime-translator-api-00004-6sm serving 100%
